tool.name: Transcript Effects for CGD
tool.description: Update a VCF with transcript-effects and nomenclature from Annovar and HGVS.
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/src/edu/ohsu/compbio/txeff/tx_eff_control.py --annovar_variant_function "${annovar_variant_function}" --annovar_exonic_variant_function "${annovar_exonic_variant_function}" --ccds_map "${ccds_map}" #if $reference_source.reference_source_selector != "no_ref" #if $reference_source.reference_source_selector != "history" --reference_fasta ${reference_source.reference_sequence.fields.path} #else --reference_fasta ${reference_source.reference_sequence} #end if #end if
#if $sequence_source.sequence_source_selector != 'configured-by-environment' #if $sequence_source.sequence_source_selector == 'seqrepo-rest-service' --sequence_source ${sequence_source.seqrepo_rest_service_url} #elif $sequence_source.sequence_source_selector == 'file-repository' --sequence_source ${sequence_source.file_repository_path} #else #raise ValueError("Unknown value for sequence source") #end if #end if
#if $benchmarking_selector == "yes" --benchmark #end if
#if $threads --threads $threads #end if
#if $variants --variants $variants #end if
--out "${out_json}"

param.name: reference_source_selector
param.label: Choose the source for the reference list

validator.message: A built-in reference genome is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: sequence_source_selector
param.label: Source for looking up reference sequences

param.name: seqrepo_rest_service_url
param.label: SeqRepo Service URL
param.help: URL of the SeqRepo REST Service (eg http://host:5000/seqrepo/)

param.name: threads
param.label: Number of threads
param.help: Number of threads to use while looking up transcripts

tool.help: usage: tx_eff_control.py [-h] --annovar_variant_function ANNOVAR_VARIANT_FUNCTION --annovar_exonic_variant_function ANNOVAR_EXONIC_VARIANT_FUNCTION --ccds_map CCDS_MAP --reference_fasta REFERENCE_FASTA --out OUT [--benchmark] [--sequence_source SEQUENCE_SOURCE] [--threads THREADS] [--variants VARIANTS] [--version]

citations.citation: @misc{tx_eff_control, author = {Pleyte, Jay}, year = {2022}, title = {Transcript Effects Tool}, publisher = {OHSU}, url = {https://github.com/ohsu-comp-bio/compbio-galaxy-wrappers/tree/master/cgd_tx_eff}, }
